text_block_list.text:
Haaa… haaaa… 
D-don't leave me behind~…
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: You're late, Spe. What the heck were you doing?
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry! Even though it's Suzuka-san's race, 
for some reason I was the one that couldn't sleep…
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Looks like you're more nervous than the 
one that's supposed to be running…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
It'd be a huge problem if Suzuka was treated as late and had her 
entry revoked because of you, you know?
text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket

text_block_list.text: Fufufuu…
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: Alright, shall we head to the race track?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Yes.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Several months after the [Takarazuka Kinen], on this day-

[Fall Tenno Sho] is being held at the Tokyo race course, 
Silence Suzuka is participating and is the favorite to win.
Suzuka!
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: Air Groove, and Fukukitaru.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: We came to cheer you on, Suzuka-san!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text:
At [Takarazuka Kinen], you got me. 
Today, I'm here to research your running style for next time.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Wait…? This was for research purposes? I'm pretty sure you 
said [Let's go cheer her on] when you invited me…
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text: R-researching your opponents, is just one type of cheering!
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: I'll be the one to beat Suzuka, so you'd better make sure to win.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'll stay in front and make it to the goal.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: I'll be praying and cheering for you! Please, do your best!
text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru

text_block_list.text: Fufufuu… I see you believe in providence.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text:
Alright, up ahead is the course, so we'll 
have to see you off from here.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Alright, up ahead is the course, so we'll 
have to see you off from here.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
But, my "feelings" are with you. 
Together, we'll see that "scenery"!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
But, my "feelings" are with you. 
Together, we'll see that "scenery"!
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Running to my heart's content, enjoying the "scenery", 
showing that "scenery" to Trainer-san, and finally-
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: I swear I'll return to Trainer-san's side.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: Understood…!
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
